title: Ship foolery as installable executable (Homebrew + GitHub install)
description: Create packaging and distribution path so users can install and run foolery as a local executable via Homebrew or directly from GitHub release artifacts.
acceptance_criteria: Executable distribution approach is defined; child tasks exist for packaging, Homebrew distribution, and README installation docs.

title: Package foolery into runnable release artifact
description: Implement packaging path (including runtime launcher and build output layout) so releases include a runnable foolery executable artifact for local install.
acceptance_criteria: Release artifact contains executable entrypoint and required runtime files; install/run path from artifact is documented for follow-on tasks.

title: Add Homebrew distribution path for foolery executable
description: Create and validate the Homebrew installation path (tap/formula and release artifact wiring) so users can install foolery with brew.
acceptance_criteria: Homebrew install path is defined and functional against published release artifacts.

title: Document Homebrew and GitHub installation in README
description: Update README with clear install instructions for both Homebrew and direct install from GitHub release artifacts.
acceptance_criteria: README includes tested command examples for brew install and direct GitHub install paths, plus basic usage/start guidance.

title: Repo registry screen component

title: visual consistency during bulk edit
description:
when you select a bead it fucking shifts all the beads down so that the action row can be shown at the top.

that is fucking horrific.  instead, the filter contents row should swap out it's components with the bulk edit components.  they should have the exact same xyhw and padding/margin properties so that the beads stay in one place on the screen.

alternatively you can use some kind of card (doesn't have to be exactly a card) or some other kind of component that achieves the same goal - when the bulk edit state is activated, the filter components should be swapped out for the bulk edit components.

title: Directory browser UI component

title: verify / reject

if the red button is pressed, mark the bead as open.

in both cases, remove the stage:verification label.
